## Reads trimming

- **Reads trimming with ** [```3.trim.sh```](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chenh19/chemProbing/refs/heads/main/files/2025.5.29/project-1_bwa+filter/3.trim.sh)  

- Key filtering standards:  
```{r,eval=FALSE}
1.Keeping the first 200bp and discard the tail
2.Trimming the tail with average Q-score < 20 (4 bases moving window size)
3.Discarding reads with more than 10% of Q-score < 20 bases
```

- **Reads counting before and after trimming ** [```retaining_percentage.csv```](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chenh19/chemProbing/refs/heads/main/files/2025.5.29/project-1_bwa+filter/retaining_percentage.csv)
